segments.text: What do you expect of the position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope to apply my knowledge and experience on the job and make further improvement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think about occupational planning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is quite important for all of us . Without clear goals , one may lose direction and cannot pave the way for their future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me something about your goals .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a graduate , it may be more important to develop myself effectively in my future work . And whatever job I may take , I will make the best efforts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If confronted with difficult task , what will you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will make full use of the chance and get myself ready for the challenges all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you care much about your salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Salary is , admittedly , important , but I will care more about what I can learn from the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you were assigned some work which you are not so interested , would you take it or not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would take it . After all , interest is not the only thing one should care about .
segments.speaker: S2
